mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_temp.select */ SELECT stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,bot_blck_val /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,down_blck_val /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,uppr_blck_val /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 numeric */ ,top_blck_val /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 numeric */ FROM ts_dd_hbit_temp WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */
mapper.insert: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_temp.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_dd_hbit_temp ( stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,bot_blck_val /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,down_blck_val /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,uppr_blck_val /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 numeric */ ,top_blck_val /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 numeric */ ) VALUES ( #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,#{botBlckVal} /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,#{downBlckVal} /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,#{upprBlckVal} /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 numeric */ ,#{topBlckVal} /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 numeric */ )
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_temp.update */ UPDATE ts_dd_hbit_temp
,bot_blck_val = #{botBlckVal} /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 numeric */
,down_blck_val = #{downBlckVal} /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 numeric */
,uppr_blck_val = #{upprBlckVal} /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 numeric */
,top_blck_val = #{topBlckVal} /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 numeric */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */

/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_temp.merge */ INSERT INTO ts_dd_hbit_temp ( stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,bot_blck_val /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,down_blck_val /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,uppr_blck_val /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 numeric */ ,top_blck_val /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 numeric */ ) VALUES ( #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,#{botBlckVal} /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,#{downBlckVal} /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 numeric */ ,#{upprBlckVal} /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 numeric */ ,#{topBlckVal} /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 numeric */ ) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE

,uppr_blck_val = #{upprBlckVal} /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 numeric */
,top_blck_val = #{topBlckVal} /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 numeric */
mapper.delete: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_temp.delete */ DELETE FROM ts_dd_hbit_temp WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */
